Instruction: In a medium saucepan, place eggs and cover with cold water. Bring to a boil, then remove from heat. Let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. Cool, peel, and remove from hot water.
Mash the yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper until smooth; set aside whites.
Stuff egg white halves with yolk mixture. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
